/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the background, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, golden glow.
